note.p: Author. Daughter of George Darling, farmer, and his wife Helen, of Chatton, Northumberland. Married Fenton John Aylmer (1835–62) at Oving, Sussex, in 1857.
CDEL supplement, s.v. Aylmer, Mrs Fenton
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/1996/16/1), 1901 (RG13/63/86/6)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 4 September 2019)
Correspondence vol. 15, letter from I. E. Aylmer, 5 December 1867
Wales, select births and baptisms, 1541–1907 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 4 September 2019)
